articles.author: Bryan Mena
articles.title: Consumer confidence plummets to lowest level since January 2021 - CNN
articles.description: America’s economic mood continues to deteriorate as President Donald Trump carries on with his sweeping economic agenda.
articles.content:
Summary
  • Americans increasingly expect higher inflation and more predict a recession, with expectations for future conditions at a 12-year low.
